faq.title: Ask us, we're happy to help

questions.question: What's included in the rental price?
questions.answer: The package includes a technician, 4 microphones, 3 static cameras, professional lighting, and sound monitoring throughout the session.

questions.question: What equipment do we have in the studio?
questions.answer: Our studio is equipped with 4x Rode Pod Mic microphones, 1x Rodecaster Pro 2 mixing console, professional studio lighting, 2x Sony Alpha ZV-E10 II cameras, and 1x Sony A6400 camera.

questions.question: How quickly can we get the final output?
questions.answer: For packages with post-production, we typically deliver finished video and audio within 3 business days. Reels are delivered at the same time, or by agreement, express delivery.

questions.question: How many people fit in the studio?
questions.answer: Four guests can sit at the table during recording.

questions.question: Can we bring our own cameraman or technician?
questions.answer: Yes. The studio is modular, so we can adapt the layout to the cameras you bring. Our technician will help with setup and audio.

questions.question: How does booking work?
questions.answer: Select a package and recording length, click Book and fill out the booking form. After submission, we'll send you detailed preparation and a checklist within 24 hours.

questions.question: Where can we park and how to get here by public transport?
questions.answer: Parking is available directly at the studio premises. The public transport stop is nearby - buses and trams stop at 'Betliarska' station, which is only 2 minutes walk from the studio.
